text: Takheun peue laen lon cok keu wali Peue nyang ek jibri meunyo kon Aflah Tuhan nyang peujeut langet ngon bumoe Makanan tanyoe Neubri le Allah Hana keu Tuhan tabri makanan Takheun Neuyue lon nyang phon meunyerah Neuyue lon phon-phon tamong Iseulam Jok droe bak Tuhan nyang Maha Murah Bek peuchrikat gata keu Tuhan
